channel.title: SalvourScape 2
channel.description:
Hey guys, due to my server real laggy since many updates has happened im making another server now I need some people. This server will be pk or non - pk due to the descision of the staff. People may recruit now to either code, make it cheat - free, be forum administrators or moderators at http://salvourscapeheadquarters.smfforfree2.com, or testers and this is gonna be no-ip based coders will get to choose the server base too. NEW: I now also need client coders to make a client that only connects to the no-ip. The client coders will start once the no-ip and server base is done.
[center][b][i][glow=red,2,300]-SalvourScape 2-[/glow][/center]
[center][b][i][u][glow=silver,2,300]Client Coders[/glow][/u][/i][/b][/center]
liamsford None None None None
[center][b][i][move]CODERS[/move][/center]
None None None None None None None None
[center][s][i]TESTERS[/i][/s][/center]
None None None
[center][font=Verdana]FORUM ADMINISTRATOR & MODERATOR[/font][/center]
Forrest None None None None None None
[center][shadow=red,left][glow=blue,2,300]Server Staff & Mods[/glow][/shadow][/center]
ikick liamsford None None None None None None None
I hope you guys choose the right job. If you wish to contact me, pm me.
Job Layout:
[code] [b]Gender:[/b][i][/i] [b]Name:[/b] [i][/i] [b]Position:[/b] [i][/i] [b]Experienced:[/b] [i][/i] [b]Can code:[/b] [i][/i][/code]

item.title: SalvourScape 2

item.description:
@Spit_It_Out wrote:

I’m a new member but I want to fill in one or both of these possitions.

Gender:Male
Name: Forrest
Position: Forum mod/admin, and/or server moderator
Experienced: I am good with IPB forums and alittle new to phpbb, as for being a admin or moderator on your server I am good with simple stuff but not a good coder. Pretty much I’m good with the stuff in the game or on the forums but not good when it comes to coding the game.
Can code: no.

Read full topic
